short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save & Download All Videos From TikTok, Without a Watermark!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a download icon next to the videos which allows you to download any video you like, check the screenshots for more details.

Features:
- Download all videos from TikTok even if download is disabled by publisher!
- Download videos without watermark!
- Download in full HD or highest definition available!
- Matches dark and light themes!
- Works in all pages!
- Matches TikTok's aesthetics
